attr.name: epsilon
attr.desc: Gets or sets the exactness delta of the :class:`Vector`.

attr.name: elements
attr.desc:
Gets or sets the elements of the :class:`Vector`.
This will only set a maximum of :attr:`dimension` values.

class.name: Vector2
class.desc:
Creates a new Vector2.
A simple 2D vector containing only two elements.

attr.name: elements
attr.desc:
Gets or sets the elements of the :class:`Vector2`.
This will only set a maximum of two values.

attr.name: x
attr.desc: Gets or sets first element of the :class:`Vector2`.

attr.name: y
attr.desc: Gets or sets second element of the :class:`Vector2`.

class.name: Vector3
class.desc:
Creates a new Vector3.
A simple 3D vector containing only three elements.

attr.name: elements
attr.desc:
Gets or sets the elements of the :class:`Vector3`.
This will only set a maximum of three values.

attr.name: x
attr.desc: Gets or sets first element of the :class:`Vector3`.

attr.name: y
attr.desc: Gets or sets second element of the :class:`Vector3`.

attr.name: z
attr.desc: Gets or sets third element of the :class:`Vector3`.
